body_html: I'll try to repro in nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu14.04 and ubuntu:14.10, but note that Ubuntu 14.10 is EOLed, so if the problem turns out to be an issue related to the distro packaged software, we probably won't be able to fix it.
body_text: I'll try to repro in nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu14.04 and ubuntu:14.10, but note that Ubuntu 14.10 is EOLed, so if the problem turns out to be an issue related to the distro packaged software, we probably won't be able to fix it.
body: I'll try to repro in `nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel-ubuntu14.04` and `ubuntu:14.10`, but note that Ubuntu 14.10 is EOLed, so if the problem turns out to be an issue related to the distro packaged software, we probably won't be able to fix it.
